input.sentences: the party was filled with freshmen .
we decided to go ride coasters .
the second one was a little more exciting .
after coasters | we ate lunch outside .
output.sentences: Kevin, the man who was too afraid to walk across a high bridge walkway, couldn't believe he had been talked into riding a roller coaster.
As the cars of the coaster climbed higher, Kevin grew more nervous.
He could see the top of the big hill ahead.
In a rush of wind and screams, they flew down the steep incline, finally facing Kevin's fear of heights.
As they sat around the lunch table after, he had to admit he was glad he had conquered his fear.
